categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 28 is the twenty-eighth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It features the stories "Ghosts of Kashyyyk, Part 2," by John Barber, and "Secret Agent Droids, Part 2," by Michael Moreci.
The issue is a Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker title, and it was published on November 27, 2019 by IDW Publishing.

In this second installment of a three-part story, the mighty Wookiees of Kashyyyk must defend their home against the armies of the evil First Order. Plus, R2-D2, C-3PO, and BB-8 team up on a top-secret spy adventure for the Resistance.
